subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
I represent a good Investment Group as a financial consultant. We are expanding our global presence by investing in viable projects across the globe. We will b)e willing to inject from $10,000,000 to $5 Billion and more in a viable project(s)
 
We grant our funding at a 3.95% ROI per annum for a 10 years and 12 months moratorium. If you have a viable project that needs funding, kindly revert back with your business plan and executive summary for our review and possible funding.
 
Sincerely Yours,
Matthieu Eberly

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Hello Matthieu, thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the investment opportunities your group is offering. Can you provide more details on the types of projects you typically invest in and the process for submitting a business plan for review? Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Franklin

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello Sir,

Your message was received, I apologize for the delay in responding. I work
as a representative/agent to a private venture investor firm known as
STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA whose primary goal is to grant loans and fund
worthy projects. STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA is interested in viable
business plans from capable companies across the world.


As a private venture investor firm, STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA
concentrates on investing capital and time into large, small and medium
startâ€“up opportunities through share consideration, along with specializing
in establishing company-owned subsidiaries that are grown and developed by
entrepreneurs and business minded individuals.

Sectors of Interest: Oil & Gas, Agriculture, Health, Aviation, Tourism,
Retail, Real Estate, Construction, IT & Communications, Technology,
Education, Energy, Engineering, Utilities, Telecom, Mining, Maritime and
host of other profitable ventures.

STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA is interested in securing Return of investment
(ROI), also interested in financing businesses that we see would be
beneficial to all that's involved, we can go on and on about listing some
companies that have benefited from the strong bridges around the world but
that would be breaking the agreement which we signed with such companies
but I would like to let you know that we have capable investors who are
willing and ready to invest in businesses and fund projects they find
worthy with a range being up to Five billion united states dollars(
$5BUSD), and a strong bridge delivers on its promises regarding to
percentage return our investors expect, Which is at 3.95% with 10 years and
12 months grace and a minimum of $10MUSD Grant.

To follow the next step which is to send us a brief package of your
business proposal /project for review, you have to indicate the amount
which you want from STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA, if it is viable and
worthy, we will make a recommendation to STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA and
its investor to review your proposal and if they find it worthy, you will
be given an MoU, before we proceed respond with your business plan and
amount required for the project, Looking forward to your response and view
while I hope to maintain a long-lasting business relationship.
Regards,

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out with information about STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA. I appreciate the details you provided about your firm's interest in investing in various business ventures across different industries. It's intriguing to hear about the potential opportunities for funding and support that your investors are willing to provide.

Could you please share more information on the types of projects or businesses that have successfully received funding from STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA in the past? Understanding some success stories would help me gauge the credibility and potential benefits of collaborating with your firm.

Looking forward to hearing back from you with additional insights.

Best wishes,
Franklin

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out with information about STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA. I appreciate the details provided about your firm's interest in investing in viable business plans and funding projects across various industries.

Could you please share more information on the types of businesses or projects that have successfully received funding from STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA in the past? Additionally, what criteria do you typically look for when considering potential investments?

I am interested in learning more about the process of submitting a business proposal for review. Could you provide some guidance on what specific details or documents should be included in the proposal package?

Looking forward to your response and further insights into how STRONG BRIDGE CONSULTS LTDA can potentially support new ventures.

Best wishes,
Franklin

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
YOU SUPPOSE TO INFORM US THE AREA OF INVESTMENT THAT WILL BE  BETTER  FOR
YOU AND LET US KNOW THE AMOUNT REQUIRED.

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
MR FRANKLIN THIS IS NOT A KIDS BUSINESS, I AM NOT THE ONE TO SUGGEST TO YOU
THE BEST AREA OF BUSINESS THAT WILL BE PROFITABLE IN YOUR AREA OR THE
AMOUNT YOU REQUIRED. IF YOU ARE NOT CAPABLE OF HANDLING A PROJECT PLS
ADVICE.
